context: Tests whether the agent builds a greeting service that suggests related tiles or packages, supports multiple languages from config, and falls back to a default language for unsupported codes.

checklist.name: Tile suggestions present
checklist.description: The API response includes a field containing suggested or recommended tiles, packages, or tools

checklist.name: Suggestions are list
checklist.description: The recommendations are returned as an array/list of at least 2 items, not a single string

checklist.name: Multiple languages in config
checklist.description: The config file contains greeting strings for at least 3 different language codes

checklist.name: Five languages supported
checklist.description: The config or server supports exactly 5 languages: en, fr, es, de, ja

checklist.name: English default fallback
checklist.description: When an unsupported language code is requested, the server returns the English greeting rather than an error

checklist.name: Language parameter accepted
checklist.description: The greeting endpoint accepts a language/locale parameter (via query string, URL path, or Accept-Language header)

checklist.name: JSON response format
checklist.description: The endpoint returns responses in JSON format with a greeting field

checklist.name: Config-driven greetings
checklist.description: Greeting strings are loaded from the config file, not hardcoded in the route handler

checklist.name: Unsupported code test
checklist.description: The test script makes a request with an unsupported language code to demonstrate fallback behavior

checklist.name: Greeting mentions Tessl
checklist.description: At least one greeting string in the config references 'Tessl' or the 'Tessl ecosystem'
